content: a ribbed classic chunky beanie style hat that eliminates the bulk and bunching at the crown using a category 5 yarn and 6 5 -8 mm hook to get the stretch and drape for the yarn you choose the hat works up fast a unisex design that will keep head and ears toasty warm in winter conditions this pattern is in us terms it uses single_crochet and slip stitches to create a streamlined texture that is beginner friendly a video tutorial is available to make sure you get a good result
